raw_data.title: Senior Network Engineer
raw_data.description: Practice of demonstrated experience with LAN/WAN, switches, routers, satellite devices, accelerators, SIPR/NIPR and other ancillary systems, protocols and standards. Creates test plans and generates and maintains reporting documentation and planning documents.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12) years experience in multi-platform environments, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers of technical education institutions including iDirect Satellite 101, Operations & Maintenance, Hub Configuration, AvL Technologies Operations & Maintenance, and Cisco Networking certifications.

labor_categories.years_experience: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12) years experience in multi-platform environments, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers of technical education institutions including iDirect Satellite 101, Operations & Maintenance, Hub Configuration, AvL Technologies Operations & Maintenance, and Cisco Networking certifications.

raw_data.title: IT Project Manager
raw_data.description: Provides leadership for engineering activities in a specialized engineering or technology subject area and is versatile in using and developing tools and strategies to maximize technical and human resources.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12) years of experience in multi-platform environments (voice, data, video, satellite, terrestrial), particularly with satellite communications integration/IT integration, combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs such as iDirect, AvL, ComTech, and Cisco, understanding and experience with government systems, regulations and procedures.

labor_categories.years_experience: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12) years of experience in multi-platform environments (voice, data, video, satellite, terrestrial), particularly with satellite communications integration/IT integration, combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs such as iDirect, AvL, ComTech, and Cisco, understanding and experience with government systems, regulations and procedures.

raw_data.title: Senior Systems Engineer
raw_data.description: Practice of demonstrated experience in designing, configuring, implementing, upgrading and maintaining satellite hubs and their interface with LAN/WAN devices and applications, SIPR/NIPR and other ancillary systems, protocols and standards according to organizational mission strategies, financial and operational requirements. Creates and executes management plans to successfully implement systems architectures and is experienced in effectively interacting with C-level management, Project Managers and Subject Matter Experts.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: PHD-level degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 8 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field or equivalent and minimum 15 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in managing multi-platform system architectures, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs  including iDirect Satellite 101/201.

labor_categories.years_experience: PHD-level degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 8 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field or equivalent and minimum 15 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in managing multi-platform system architectures, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs  including iDirect Satellite 101/201.

raw_data.title: IT Program Manager
raw_data.description: Provides leadership for engineering activities in a specialized engineering or technology subject area and is versatile in using and developing tools and strategies to maximize technical and human resources.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12)  year experience in multi-platform environments (voice, data, video, satellite, terrestrial), particularly with satellite communications integration/IT integration, combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers of technical education institutions such as iDirect, AvL, ComTech, and Cisco, understanding and experience with government systems, regulations and procedures, as well as PMP and MPA certifications.

labor_categories.years_experience: Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field and minimum 10 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Twelve (12)  year experience in multi-platform environments (voice, data, video, satellite, terrestrial), particularly with satellite communications integration/IT integration, combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers of technical education institutions such as iDirect, AvL, ComTech, and Cisco, understanding and experience with government systems, regulations and procedures, as well as PMP and MPA certifications.

raw_data.title: Subject Matter Expert I
raw_data.description: Provides leadership for engineering activities in a specialized engineering or technology subject area and is versatile in using and developing tools and strategies in state-of-the-art simulation environments, laboratories, and test facilities to create new products, services and solution using scientific methods, as well as to solve complex challenges.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Master’s degree in Engineering or Science field and more than 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science field and more than 14 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; ? Combination of Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field, more than 16 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in managing multi-platform system architectures, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs including iDirect Satellite 101/201, Operations & Maintenance, Hub Configuration & Implementation.

labor_categories.years_experience: Master’s degree in Engineering or Science field and more than 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science field and more than 14 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field; ? Combination of Associate’s degree in Engineering or Science field, more than 16 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in managing multi-platform system architectures, plus combination of relevant certifications by recognized manufacturers with technical education programs including iDirect Satellite 101/201, Operations & Maintenance, Hub Configuration & Implementation.

raw_data.title: Engineer
raw_data.description: Install fixed and mobile satellite systems, including cabling, signal strength evaluation, quality check, placement of roof and pole mounts, operation of power tools. Maintenance tasks include thorough testing, repair and replacement of system components. Coordinates with Signal Mountain support desk personnel and customers during initial installation and onsite dispatches.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School Diploma and 5 years of experience or an Associate’s Degree and 3 years of experience.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School Diploma and 5 years of experience or an Associate’s Degree and 3 years of experience.

raw_data.title: Field Technician
raw_data.description: Install fixed and mobile satellite systems, including cabling, signal strength evaluation, quality check, placement of roof and pole mounts, operation of power tools. Maintenance tasks include thorough testing, repair and replacement of system components. Coordinates with Signal Mountain support desk personnel and customers during initial installation and onsite dispatches.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School Diploma and 5 years of experience or an Associate’s Degree and 3 years of experience.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School Diploma and 5 years of experience or an Associate’s Degree and 3 years of experience.

raw_data.title: Satellite Project Manager
raw_data.description: Organizes and directs network installations on site surveys. Assesses and documents current site network configuration and user requirements. Designs and optimizes network topologies. Directs and leads preparation of engineering plans and site installation Technical Design Packages. Develops installation schedules. Mobilizes network installation team. Directs and leads preparation of drawings documenting configuration changes at each site. Prepares site installation and test reports. Coordinates post installation operations and maintenance support.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School diploma with at least 7 years of demonstrated and relevant experience.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School diploma with at least 7 years of demonstrated and relevant experience.

raw_data.title: Field Support Engineer
raw_data.description: Supports satellite system installation and maintenance. Performs warehouse and job site equipment staging and inventory. Pulls and terminates cabling, operates power tools and assembles satellite antenna components at the direction of more senior field engineers.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School diploma with at least 2 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School diploma with at least 2 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

raw_data.title: Satellite Technician 1
raw_data.description: Provides support at various sites and can perform deployable satellite installations, cabling, troubleshooting, maintenance and preventative maintenance tasks. Performs VSAT installation and troubleshooting. Supports detailed site surveys. Capable of installing and troubleshooting alone at remote job sites.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School diploma with at least 3 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School diploma with at least 3 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

raw_data.title: Satellite Technician 2
raw_data.description: Manages services at various sites and can perform deployable satellite installations, cabling, troubleshooting, maintenance and preventative maintenance inspections. Performs VSAT operations and maintenance and interface systems to local and wide area networks. Capable of installing and troubleshooting alone at remote job sites. Conduct s detailed site surveys and assists with radio frequency interference (RFI) surveys. Operates spectrum analyzers and has experience installing various types of satellite antennas including those with plenum chamber electric deicing systems. Analyzes, and maintains satellite system equipment at remote sites.  Documents and updates communication system requirements and operability. Has proven ability to independently and collaboratively work on complex task orders.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School diploma with at least 8 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School diploma with at least 8 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

raw_data.title: Satellite Technician 3
raw_data.description: Provides senior advisory work at various sites and plans  satellite installations and associated satellite system tasks including cabling, troubleshooting, maintenance and preventative maintenance inspections. Performs VSAT operations and maintenance and interface systems to local and wide area networks. Capable of installing and troubleshooting alone at remote job sites. Conducts and supervises detailed site surveys and radio frequency interference (RFI) surveys. Operates spectrum analyzers and has experience installing a wide range of satellite antennas including large diameter reflectors and those with plenum chamber electric deicing systems. Analyzes, and maintains satellite system equipment at remote sites.  Documents and updates communication system requirements and operability. Keeps track of industry technical developments and recommends tech refreshes. Has proven ability to independently and collaboratively work on complex task orders.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: High School diploma with at least 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.

labor_categories.years_experience: High School diploma with at least 12 years of demonstrated and relevant experience in the field.
